name: polythene
description: Polymer inspired modular implementation of Material Design for Mithril.

scripts.install-mdif: mkdir -p external_modules && cd external_modules && git clone git@github.com:zavoloklom/material-design-iconic-font.git
scripts.copy-mdif: mkdir -p lib/font-iconic/material-design-iconic-font/css && cp external_modules/material-design-iconic-font/css/* lib/font-iconic/material-design-iconic-font/css/ && mkdir -p lib/font-iconic/material-design-iconic-font/fonts && cp external_modules/material-design-iconic-font/fonts/* lib/font-iconic/material-design-iconic-font/fonts/ && mkdir -p lib/svg/material-design-iconic-font && cp -R external_modules/material-design-iconic-font/svg/* lib/svg/material-design-iconic-font/
scripts.install-mdi: mkdir -p external_modules && cd external_modules && git clone git://github.com/Templarian/MaterialDesign
scripts.setup: rm -rf external_modules && npm run install-mdif && npm run install-mdi && npm run copy-mdif && npm run copy-mdi
scripts.theme-sass: cd lib/theme/ && cat _base.scss ../**/_theme.scss | scss --sourcemap=none > theme.css && rm -rf .sass-cache
scripts.build-css: npm run sass && npm run theme-sass && npm run autoprefixer

author: Arthur Clemens
